post.text:
We need to build an inclusive economy that helps everyone get ahead, including Americans with disabilities. Learn more about Hillary's plan, live from Orlando.

For live closed captioning, watch Hillary's speech here: youtu.be/r3B1cMe_DFI

comment.author: Natalie
comment.text: Remember we have to vote for other down ballot Democrats too we need to take back the House and the Sen and keep a Dem in the White House

replies.author: Parker
replies.text: This is even more important than the presidential election. Hillary will face unheard of obstruction (even worse than Obama) unless we win the House OR Senate. Both would be nice but I don't know how realistic that wish is.

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Oh please Parker, we don't need any down-notes

replies.author: Parker
replies.text: Sorry, I get despondent when I hear TV News talk about Poll numbers.

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: Trump works harder than Hillary - bottom line. If you disagree, then your head has been in a hole for a year and a half.
